  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_109720</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_109720</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Standing waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stehende Wellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues se tenantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas estando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde levantesi in piedi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόνιμα κύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas que están paradas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows several wave pairs made up of a wave travelling to the right (red) and one moving to the left (blue). Each pair produces a standing wave.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">antinodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">standing waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt einige Welle Paare, die von
einer Welle gebildet werden, die bis das Recht fortpflanzt (rot) und 
eins, das nach links bewegt (blau). Jedes Paar produziert eine 
stehende Welle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre plusieurs paires de 
vague composées d'une vague voyageant à la droite (rouge) et à on 
se déplaçant vers la gauche (bleue). Chaque paire produit une 
vague debout.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra diversos pares da onda 
compostos de uma onda que viaja à direita (vermelha) e a uma que 
move-se para a esquerda (azul). Cada par produz uma onda ereta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra parecchi 
accoppiamenti dell'onda composti di un'onda che viaggia alla destra 
(rossa) e ad una che si muove verso la parte di sinistra (blu). 
Ogni accoppiamento produce un'onda diritta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει διάφορα ζευγάρια κυμάτων
φιαγμένα επάνω από κύμα που ταξιδεύει στο δικαίωμα (κόκκινο) 
και το ένα κινούμενος προς το αριστερό (μπλε). Κάθε ζευγάρι
παράγει ένα μόνιμο κύμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra varios pares de la onda 
compuestos de una onda que viaja a la derecha (roja) y a una que se 
mueve a la izquierda (azul). Cada par produce una onda derecha.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antinodes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knotenpunkte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stehende Wellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
